OfferTemplates

Class BulkDiscountOffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • OfferTemplates.BulkDiscountOffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Offer

    public class BulkDiscountOffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Offer
    Calculates discount when a product is purchased in bulk.
